resources.string:
ReGeX /ˈrɛːɡɛx/ is an android game, with a simple objective: Find a regular expression which does match certain strings, but doesn't match others.


Depending on how long the expression is, how many regex characters you used and a few more variables, your score is generated. From the number of game and your score (high score and less games), the current level is calculated. The higher the level, the more complex the challenges become. There is no last or final level - it just goes on forever growing square-root-like.


Below I have added a link to a cheat-sheet on regular expression, for those unfamiliar with the syntax.


---


This app is free software (Licence: GPLv2+), and hosted on GitHub. If you want a new feature or found a bug, please submit a issue. Pull requests are also gladly appreciated.
The random game mode will generate random strings, without any special meaning for you to solve. The game mode can be played offline, and loads quickly.

The REDB game mode will get it\'s tasks from a ReGeX game server, and let you contribute to it\'s solution database. This will require a working internet connection, and may task slightly longer to load, but the tasks are probably better or more challenging.\n Below you may enter a new IP/Host address to connect to.
